instruction: Compose a short song about freedom.
output:
Verse 1:
Oh, freedom in my heart, I can feel it deep inside,
It's a feeling that can never be denied,
A flame that never dies, no matter what may come,
It gives me courage and strength to carry on.

Chorus:
Oh, let us keep our freedom for all time,
It's a right that will carry on through the ages,
So, let us all take a stand, and keep our freedom alive,
Oh, freedom will last forever and all time.

Verse 2:
The freedom that I feel, it'll give me hope and joy,
It's a gift that will never be destroyed,
It's a fire that will never be kept at bay,
Till we all can live in a world of peace one day.

Chorus:
Oh, let us keep our freedom for all time,
It's a right that will carry on through the ages,
So, let us all take a stand, and keep our freedom alive,
Oh, freedom will last forever and all time.
